DYSL SM Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for Junior Research Fellow Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Jul 28, 2025, 15:02 IST
 Defence Research and Development Organisation
 1 Jobs |  Posted On : 28-Jul-2025 |  Telangana |  Salary : 37,000 to 37,000




FOLLOW

The DRDO Young Scientists Laboratory for Smart Materials (DYSL SM) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Junior Research Fellow Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their  B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Mechanical Engineering can apply for the DYSL SM Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, pay scale, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Telangana.

DYSL SM Recruitment 2025 Eligiblity Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Junior Research Fellow	01	B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Mechanical Engineering

DYSL SM Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 28 Years.
Age relaxation is based on the Organisation's norms.

DYSL SM Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the interview.

DYSL SM Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

There is no application fee.

DYSL SM Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 37,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the DYSL SM Recruitment 2025:
Go to the Official website.
Visit the DYSL SM Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligiblity criteria.
Download the application form.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form to the mentioned address.
Take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Address:

Refer to the official notification.

Important Dates:

Starting date	28-07-2025
Closing date	26-08-2025

 

Official Notification and Application Form	Click Here
